participant_1.background:
I live in my hometown right now, but I'm planning to move to Australia in the future.
I love to create spooky decorations for Halloween.
I need a place where I can practice my guitar without disturbing the neighbors.
I get to work from home, so I can avoid my allergens.
I'm counting down the days to retirement and enjoying my singing time in the shower.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy my work as a software engineer, but it can be stressful
I love sharing stories of my adventures with my family and friends over a home-cooked meal.
I am a bit of an oddball, but I try to get along with my family.
i eat meat.
I'm moving to a new house so I can have more space for my book collection.

content.text: Not much, just moved into a new house so I'm trying to get settled in.
Oh nice, where did you move from?
I moved from my old house in the suburbs to a new one in the city.
Why'd you move to the city?
I wanted to be closer to work and I also wanted to be in a more walkable neighborhood.
I see, does your new house have a lot of space?
Yes, it's actually a lot bigger than my old house.
What are you going to do with all the extra space?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about putting in a home theater or a pool.
Those are both great ideas. I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun in your new house.
Thanks, I'm excited to start living here.
Well, I have to go now. It was nice talking to you.
You too, have a good day.
